title: High-performance activated carbon from coconut shells for dye removal: study of isotherm and thermodynamics
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,33797-33808
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06287F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Junaid Saleem, Zubair Khalid Baig Moghal, Snigdhendubala Pradhan, Gordon McKay
This study explores producing high-performance activated carbon from coconut shells using acid and base activation, along with biochar functionalization, to efficiently remove dyes from water.
